title: One Pot Shrimp Alfredo
directions: Cook pasta to al dente. Add salt while cooking if desired.
Throw in shrimp and peas last three minutes of pasta cooking, just long enough to heat through.
Drain. Return to pot and add sauce.
Stir; add cheese and stir some more.
ingredients: 8 ounces frozen cooked shrimp, medium-sized, cleaned
1⁄2 to taste black pepper, fresh ground
